overview: Sri (27) has always been so strong in her life. Every day she never stops working, moving, she doesnâ€™t want to give up and die easily, she does all of that for her husband and child. Until that night on Eid al-Fitr, she gets into something she never imagined and lost what she has worked hard for, but Sri never gives up and finds another way for the better.
title: Fitrah
